notes.title: Improving Gestureâ€“Structure Integration
notes.content:
I feel like my figure drawings are improving but still look stiff.
My proportions get thrown off when the pose is dynamic, especially in the torso and legs.
I sometimes lose the gesture when I focus on construction, and when I try to add structure, the flow disappears.
I want to get better at combining gesture flow with accurate structure, especially in twisting or foreshortened poses.

notes.title: Today I felt really good because I practiced a lot and really didnt get distracted
